long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Epic Zeit: The Most Beautiful Time Zone Tracker

No bullshit, just beautiful time zones!

Epic Zeit is an open source free application..
Epic Zeit do not have ads.
Epic Zeit do not collect data of any kind.

Epic Zeit is a beautiful free open-source web app and extension that simplifies tracking time zones among colleagues, friends, and family worldwide.

All your time zones in one place.

Carefully designed interface let you effortlessly compare multiple time zones at a glance, plan conference calls, international online meetings or monitoring of global market hours.

Visually stunning Chrome extension designed to revolutionize the way you view, track, and synchronize multiple time zones. Whether you're working with international teams, staying connected with family and friends around the world, or simply love to travel, Epic Zeit is your perfect app to effortlessly manage time differences.

*** ATTENTION ***

Epic Zeit Chrome Extension will replace your default tab, it will become your home page. 
In menu dropdown you can access your default new tab.

If you don't want chrome extension checkout web app at https://epiczeit.com/app

Hope you love it. Share with others.
